title: Selected Hanky 100% Cotton Men's Handkerchiefs 6 Piece Gift Set

description: This set are fashion patterned handkerchiefs set with stitching at the edge. They are not only better for your nose but also environment friendly for the planet! We pay full attention to any detail during the process from raw material picking to finished handkerchief, to ensure the product we delivered to you are SELECTED HANKY.- Buy an extra pack for yourself, or as a perfect gift for any gentleman (or lady), dad, grandpa, family member or friend, you won't regret it!
